lead_paragraph: The unprecedented move by the South Korean electronics giant is an embarrassing reversal for a respected global brand.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Emily Feng, Vindu Goel, Cecilia Kang and Carlos Tejada.
byline.original: By BRIAN X. CHEN and CHOE SANG-HUN

headline.print_headline: Samsung Junks Popular Phone Plagued by Fire
headline.main: Why Samsung Abandoned Its Galaxy Note 7 Flagship Phone

snippet: The unprecedented move by the South Korean electronics giant is an embarrassing reversal for a respected global brand....
abstract: Samsung cancels its popular Galaxy Note 7 smartphone following several instances in which phones have spontaneously exploded; drastic move is highly unusual in technology industry, where companies opt to improve product over killing it altogether; move deals blow to company already plagued by falling shares.
